'''v0.8.0 alpha build 7''' is the sixth build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.8.0 alpha|0.8.0]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Ice]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Ice (item) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] to [[File:Ice BE2.png|32px]].
* Inventory icon changed from [[File:Ice JE1.png|32px]] to [[File:Ice BE2.png|32px]].
'''[[Powered rail]]'''
* Inventory icon changed from [[File:Off Powered Rail (texture) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] to [[File:On Powered Rail (texture) JE1 BE1.png|32px]].

=== Items ===
'''[[Bow]]s, [[bowl]]s, and wooden [[tool]]s'''
* Can now be used as fuel in a furnace, smelting 1 item each.

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[Minecart]]s'''
* The UI message "Tap Jump to leave the minecart" now appears when a minecart has been boarded.
* The left, right, and down buttons on the d-pad are no longer visible when riding a minecart.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Creative inventory]]'''
* [[Light gray wool]]'s inventory slot has been moved to be in between white wool and gray wool.
'''[[AI]]'''
* Performance has been improved.

== Fixes ==

'''10 bugs fixed'''

* Fixed text input on Android.
* Fixed [[Leaves|spruce and birch leaves]] being swapped.
* Fixed [[furnace]] side texture.
* Fixed [[sandstone slab]] side texture.
* Fixed red hurt overlay on [[skeleton]]s and [[chicken]]s.
* Fixed an artifact over the flame in the furnace screen.
* [[TNT]] doesn’t send you into orbit anymore.
* Fixed armor slots having no health bar.
* Fixed autojumping while in minecarts.
* Fixed falling into the ground when exiting a minecart that’s on rails.</onlyinclude>
